response.overview: Take a journey through Switzerland to explore its most remarkable sites and colourful characters, a picture of the country past and present. From the edge of Lake Geneva, our journey continues along the Alpine chain. En route we get to meet a wine waiter from Côte d'Ivoire, who has become a top connoisseur of Swiss grands crus, and a specialist studying prehistoric remains on the banks of the Neuchâtel Lake.
response.title: Home Swiss Home
